text:
The jk_nt_service comming with Tomcat 3.3 (and 3.3.1-dev as of today)

does not set its exit code.



Ok, granted, if the user does not give a command line option

it does a exit(-1), but otherwise the exit code is never set,

regardless of if the operation succeeded or not.



This precludes the use of this little programm in an automated 

environment like InstallShield because you cannot tell if

everything is alright (apart from parsing stdout).



In addition it always writes a non-error 

message about an obtained WINSOCK to stderr.

to stderr even
creator: olaf.jahn@zamioculcas.net
